column5: For anyone interested that do their own maintenace on boat motors, Princess Autos next sale has the water flushing attachment for the lower unit on sale($4.99) along with the lower unit oil pump($5.99). Sale starts 10 April. There's also electrical anti corrosion spray, good for trailer connectors and also hitch pin locks.  Makes things  little cheaper for the DIYer.
Thanks for the heads up Fisherman,  I like that store.
